txt.en:
'[placeholder], you have aided us well. Only one task remains...we must break their leadership. My men have heard talk of a brutal man named Lanferth, who dwells deep within Hordfierd. He leads the brigands on raids into Ost Celebrant and is notorious for making certain that he gets his cut of the loot by any means necessary.

'We have heard whispers from his men recently that he has become very queer and often will no longer personally venture into Ost Celebrant. We have no idea why.

'Journey to Hordfierd and defeat him. Without his leadership, the brigands will not find riches in Parth Celebrant. Go, and if he has anything of value, return it to us.'
'Lanferth is no more? Good. These brigands should be thrust into chaos without his leadership, as vicious as it was.\n\n'Did you find anything of value among his keepings?'
'Defeat Lanferth, [placeholder], then perhaps the rest of his men will depart this land.'
The brigands are led by a man named Lanferth, and Idmar believes eliminating him may put an end to their invasion.
Lanferth's tent is located deep within Hordfierd.\n\nIdmar has asked you to defeat Lanferth, leader of the brigands.
Idmar is at his camp along the road in central Parth Celebrant.\n\nYou should return to Idmar at once with news of your victory.
